title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 17
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 17
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Medifast (MED). Medifast Inc.'s shares rose to a record after a second analysts began covering the weight-loss company and recommended buying its shares. Analyst Linda Bolton Weiser made the call in her first report on Medifast for D.A. Davidson, which she joined from B. Riley & Co. in April. Her 12-month price estimate for the stock is $65, which is 28 percent higher than yesterday's close.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
